TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LegendItem extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement

summary.span: 表示一个图例项，它存储在 类中。

span.span: Represents a legend item, which is stored in the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示一个图例项，它可以是默认或自定义项：The class represents a legend item, which can be either a default or custom item: - 默认图例项自动插入数据序列或数据点的图例。Default legend items are automatically inserted into the legend for either data series or data points. 饼图和圆环图的默认条目表示绘制的数据点，而所有其他图表类型的条目表示所绘制的系列。Default entries for pie and doughnut charts represent the plotted data points, whereas entries for all other chart types represent the plotted series. 默认情况下，这些图例项使用的数据点或一系列颜色符号颜色，以及图例项文本的系列或数据点的名称。By default, these legend entries use the data point or series color for the symbol color, and the name of the series or data point for the legend item text. 默认图例项可以自定义或通过使用在运行时删除事件控件。Default legend items can be customized or deleted at run time by using the event of the control. - 自定义图例项都具有用户定义的文本、 符号颜色和等。Custom legend items have user-defined text, symbol color, and so forth. 默认值与项目不同，在未连接与绘制的数据。Unlike the default entries, they are not connected with the plotted data. 设计时或运行的时，可以在添加自定义图例项使用属性对象。Custom legend items can be added at either design time or run time, using the property of the object. 图例符号可以是矩形、 线条或标记，具体取决于属性设置的对象。Legend symbols can be rectangles, lines or markers, depending on the property setting of a object. 自定义图例项的文本由属性。The text of a custom legend item is determined by the property.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 请注意，你还可以添加自定义图例项使用`Add`和`Insert`与关联的方法集合的属性对象。Note that you can also add custom legend items using the `Add` and `Insert` methods associated with the collection property of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public LegendItem (string name, System.Drawing.Color color, string image);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, valuetype System.Drawing.Color color, string image) cil managed
public: LegendItem(System::String ^ name, System::Drawing::Color color, System::String ^ image);

span.span: The name of the legend item.
The color of the legend item.

param.name: image
param.span: 显示图例项的图像的路径。

span.span: The path of the image to be displayed for the legend item.

summary.span: 使用指定的名称、颜色和图像路径初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name, color and image path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅`image`或`color`参数需要指定。Only the `image` or `color` parameter needs to be specified. 如果同时指定了，`image`参数具有优先级。If both are specified, the `image` parameter has precedence.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::GradientStyle BackGradientStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::GradientStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::GradientStyle value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项的背景渐变的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a legend item.

summary.span: 还确定是否使用渐变。

span.span: Also determines whether a gradient is used.

value.span: 一个 枚举，指示图例项的背景渐变的方向。

span.span: A enumeration that specifies the orientation for the background gradient of a legend item.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定是否标题将显示渐变，并以确定渐变的方向，如果一个使用。Use the property to determine whether a title will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used. 如果此属性仅实现属性设置为。This property is only implemented if the property is set to . 有关可用模式的列表，请参阅枚举。For a listing of available patterns, refer to the enumeration. 若要使用渐变颜色：To use gradient colors: - 使用属性来设置主要颜色。Use the property to set the primary color. - 使用属性来设置辅助颜色。Use the property to set the secondary color. - 使用此属性来设置所需的渐变样式。Use this property to set the desired gradient style. > [!NOTE] > 此属性是仅适用于对象与任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle BackHatchStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartHatchStyle value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项的阴影样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the hatching style of a legend item.

value.span: 一个 枚举，指定图例项的阴影样式。

span.span: A enumeration that specifies the hatching style of a legend item.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举指定使用类型的画笔的阴影模式。The enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type . 阴影图案由纯色背景色和背景上绘制的直线组成。The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background. 有关可用的阴影样式的列表，请参阅枚举。For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 阴影行的颜色由属性。The color of hatching lines is determined by the property. > [!NOTE] > 此属性是仅适用于对象与任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

span.span: Gets or sets a color which will be replaced with a transparent color when the background image is drawn.

value.span: 一个 值，表示绘制背景图像时，它将显示为透明色。

span.span: A value that will be displayed as transparent when the background image is drawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是仅适用于对象与任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color BackSecondaryColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项的辅助颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the secondary color of a legend item.

value.span: 一个 值，该值用于带阴影或渐变填充的背景的辅助颜色。

span.span: A value used for the secondary color of background with hatching or gradient fill.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是确定的许多辅助背景色的多个相关属性之一对象; 在应用渐变颜色时使用。The property is one of several related properties that determine the secondary background color of many objects; it is used when gradient colors are being applied. 如果此属性仅实现属性设置为。This property is only implemented if the property is set to . 你可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB alpha、 红色、 绿色 (蓝色） 值。You can set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果使用阴影，则属性确定图例项阴影线的颜色。If hatching is used, the property determines the color of the hatching lines for the legend item. 若要使用图例单元格的背景渐变颜色：To use gradient colors for a legend cell's background: 若要使用渐变颜色：To use gradient colors: - 使用属性来设置主要颜色。Use the property to set the primary color. - 使用属性来设置辅助颜色。Use the property to set the secondary color. - 使用属性来设置所需的渐变样式。Use the property to set the desired gradient style. > [!NOTE] > 此属性是仅适用于对象与任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项的边框颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of a legend item.

value.span: 一个 值，用于绘制图例项的边框颜色。

span.span: A value used to draw the border color of a legend item.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB alpha、 红色、 绿色 (蓝色） 值。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. > [!NOTE] > 如果为自定义图例项使用一个标记。If you use a marker for a custom legend item. 此属性将设置标记的边框颜色。this property will set the border color of the marker. 但是，如果也设置属性，其值的优先级。However, if the property is also set, its value has precedence. > [!NOTE] > 此属性是仅适用于对象与任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项的边框样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the border style of a legend item.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值决定了图例项的边框样式。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the border style of the legend item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定用于边框的线条样式。This property determines the line style used for a border. 行可以是实体、 线和等。The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth. 有关其他边框样式，请参阅枚举主题。For other border styles, see the enumeration topic. > [!NOTE] > 此属性是仅适用于对象与任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

value.span: 值，该值确定的宽度，以像素为单位的图例项边框。

span.span: An value that determines the width, in pixels, of the legend item border.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性还可以用于设置线条的宽度时，例如，将自定义图例项显示与样式。The property can also be used to set the width of lines when, for example, custom legend items are displayed with a style. **请注意**此属性是仅适用于对象与任一或。**Note** This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color Color { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color of a legend item.

value.span: 用于绘制图例项的 值。

span.span: A value that is used to draw the legend item.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这属性是一个多个相关属性用于获取或设置的许多图表元素的颜色; 它可以设置为任何 ARGB alpha、 红色、 绿色 (蓝色） 值。This property is one several related properties that get or set the color of many chart elements; it can be set to any ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 如果此属性设置为数据点和其系列，数据点颜色将具有优先权。If this property is set for both a data point and its series, the data point color will have precedence. 仅将不会定义自己的颜色的数据点使用序列颜色。The series color will only be used for data points that do not define their own color. 如果自定义图例项使用一个标记，此属性将确定标记颜色。If a custom legend item uses a marker, this property will determine the marker color. 但是，如果属性设置为，其值，则具有优先级。However, if the property is set, its value then has precedence. 将忽略此属性，如果属性指定要用于图例项符号的图像。This property will be ignored if the property specifies an image to be used for the legend item symbol. > [!NOTE] > 此属性是仅适用于对象与任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

summary.span: 获取或设置将为图例项符号显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that will be displayed for a legend item symbol.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图像文件的 URL。

span.span: A value that represents the URL of an image file.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定要用于的图像文件符号。This property determines the image file to be used for the symbol. 路径可以是绝对或相对 URL。The path can be an absolute or a relative URL. 如果设置背景图像时，会显示该图像而不考虑属性设置。If you set a background image, that image will be displayed regardless of the property setting. 设置属性来启用图像显示为透明所使用的一种颜色。Set the property to enable one color used by the image to appear transparent. > [!NOTE] > 此属性是仅适用于对象与任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendImageStyle ImageStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendImageStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendImageStyle value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项图像的显示样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the display style of the legend item image.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值指定图例项图片的显示样式。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the display style of the legend item image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些样式确定如何将显示项的相应的符号。These styles determine how the item's corresponding symbol will be displayed. A可以与组合样式样式。A style can be combined with a style. 若要完成此操作，首先设置属性。To accomplish this, first set the property to . 然后使用属性指定一个标记映像，或属性指定的标记样式。Then use the property to specify a marker image, or the property to specify a marker style. 生成的符号将是一条线的图像或标记的组合。The resulting symbol will be a combination of a line and an image or marker. > [!NOTE] > 此属性是仅适用于对象与任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

summary.span: 获取或设置标记的边框颜色（如果使用）。

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of the markers, if used.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示标记边框的 ARGB 颜色（alpha、红色、绿色、蓝色）。

span.span: A value that represents the ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color of a marker border.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用标记，设置属性的值以外的其他。To use markers, set the property to a value other than . 请注意，将不会标记应用到饼图、 圆环图，以及任何堆积图表类型。Note that markers will not be applied to pie, doughnut, and any stacked chart types. 对于自定义图例属性也将设置标记的边框颜色。For custom legends, the property will also set the border color of markers. 属性设置均优先于属性设置。The property setting has precedence over the property setting. > [!NOTE] > 此属性是仅适用于对象与任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

span.span: Gets or sets a marker image of the legend item.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图像文件的 URL。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示到图像文件，它可以是绝对或相对 URL 路径。Represents a path to an image file, which can be an absolute or relative URL. 若要使用标记，设置属性的值以外的其他。To use markers, set the property to a value other than . 属性优先于属性。The property takes precedence over the property. 标记图像可以是任何支持的.NET Framework，包括图标的有效图形文件。A marker image can be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 若要设置一个标记图像是透明的颜色，请使用属性。To set one color of the marker image to be transparent, use the property. > [!NOTE] > 此属性是仅适用于对象与任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color MarkerImageTransparentColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置在绘制标记图像时，将替换为透明色的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets a color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the marker image is drawn.

value.span: 值表示在绘制标记图像时，将替换为透明的颜色的 ARGB（alpha、红色、绿色和蓝色）颜色。

span.span: A value that represents an ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the marker image is drawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来标记映像将显示为透明中选择一种颜色。The property is used to select one color in a marker image that will be displayed as transparent. 你可以将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB alpha、 红色、 绿色 (蓝色） 值。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. > [!NOTE] > 此属性是仅适用于对象与任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MarkerSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项标记的大小（如果使用）。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the legend item markers, if used.

value.span: 一个 表达式，它表示标记绘图区的高度和宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: An expression that represents the height and width of the plotting area of markers, in pixels.

value.span: 默认值为 5 像素。

span.span: The default value is 5 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用标记，设置属性的值以外的其他。To use markers, set the property to a value other than . 请注意，标记将不应用于饼图、 圆环图和堆积的图中的任何类型的数据点。Note that markers will not be applied to data points of pie, doughnut and any stacked chart types. > [!NOTE] > 此属性是仅适用于对象与任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::MarkerStyle MarkerStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::MarkerStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::MarkerStyle value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyleEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项标记样式。

span.span: Gets or sets a legend item marker style.

summary.span: 也用于启用或禁用标记的显示。

span.span: Also used to enable or disable the display of markers.

value.span: 指定图例项标记样式的 整数枚举。

span.span: A integer enumeration that specifies a legend item marker style.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要禁用标记，请将此属性设置为。To disable markers, set this property to . > [!NOTE] > 此属性是仅适用于对象与任一或。This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

Public Overrides Property Name As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the legend item.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图例项的名称。

span.span: A value that represents the name of the legend item.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color SeparatorColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项分隔符的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color of the legend item separator.

value.span: 用于绘制图例项分隔符的颜色的 值。

span.span: A value used to draw the color of the legend item separator.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是适用于整个。This property is applicable to the entire .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendSeparatorStyle SeparatorType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendSeparatorStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LegendSeparatorStyle value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项的分隔符样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the separator style of the legend item.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值指定图例项的分隔符样式。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the separator style of the legend item.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SeriesName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置与默认图例项关联的 的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the associated with a default legend item.

value.span: 一个 值，它确定与默认图例项关联的序列的名称。

span.span: A value that determines the name of the series associated with a default legend item.

value.span: 默认值为零长度的字符串。

span.span: The default value is a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性仅应在事件，以确定默认图例项表示的数据系列。This property should only be used in the event, to determine which data series a default legend entry represents. 属性适用于饼图和球体图之外的所有图表; 其默认图例项对应绘制数据点，而不是绘制序列。The property applies to all charts except pie and sphere charts; their default legend items correspond to plotted data points, and not to plotted series. 当你处理饼图和球体图时，使用属性改为。When you deal with pie and sphere charts, use the property instead. 不应由开发人员设置此属性。This property should not be set by the developer. > [!NOTE] > 此属性是适用于整个。This property is applicable to the entire .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SeriesPointIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置与默认图例项关联的 对象的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of a object associated with a default legend item.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示默认图例关联的数据点在从零开始的索引中的位置。

span.span: An value that represents the location of the default legend's associated data point in a zero-based index.

value.span: 除了饼图和圆环图之外的所有图表类型都将返回负一 (-1)。

span.span: All chart types except for pie and doughnut charts will return a negative one (-1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性仅应在事件，以确定默认饼图或球体图表图例条目表示的对象。This property should only be used in the event to determine the object that is represented by a default pie or sphere chart legend entry. 图表类型而非饼图或球体图将返回负一 (-1)，因为默认图例项对应绘制序列，并且不会绘制数据点。Chart types other than pie or sphere charts will return a negative one (-1), because the default legend items correspond to plotted series, and not plotted data points. 使用属性用于这些图表类型。Use the property for these chart types. 不应由开发人员设置此属性。This property should not be set by the developer. > [!NOTE] > 此属性是适用于整个。This property is applicable to the entire .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color ShadowColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项的阴影颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow color of a legend item.

value.span: 一个 值，表示图例项的阴影色。

span.span: A value that represents the shadow color of a legend item.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置几个的阴影颜色图表元素，并且可以设置为任何有效的 ARGB alpha、 红色、 绿色 (蓝色） 值。Gets or sets the shadow color of several chart elements, and can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. Alpha 值可以用于实现"真实"隐藏作用;请尝试使用"128,0,0,0"的一种颜色的阴影。The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try using a color of "128,0,0,0" for shadows. 若要实现阴影，设置为零 (0) 以外的值的属性。To implement a shadow, set the property to a value other than zero (0). **请注意**此属性是仅适用于对象与任一或。**Note** This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ShadowOffset { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项的阴影偏移量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of a legend item.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示相关图表元素的阴影偏移量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: An value that represents the shadow offset, in pixels, of the relevant chart element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要实现阴影，请使用零 (0) 以外的值。To implement shadowing, use a value other than zero (0). 正值将导致阴影向下和向右移动。A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right. 负值将导致阴影向上和向左移动。A negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left. **请注意**此属性是仅适用于对象与任一或。**Note** This property is applicable only to objects with a of either or .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ToolTip { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图例项的工具提示。

span.span: Gets or sets the tooltip of the legend item.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示图例项的工具提示。

span.span: A value that represents the tooltip for the legend item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以设置要显示不同类型的与图表相关的数据的特殊关键字。This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[关键字[rs_vsDataVis]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8a19d422-4eee-45ff-a5c3-feff7b76fa8c)。For more information, see [Keywords [rs_vsDataVis]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8a19d422-4eee-45ff-a5c3-feff7b76fa8c). > [!NOTE] > 此属性是适用于整个。This property is applicable to the entire .
